HYDROARC 181/25(GEN).
1. HYDROARC WARNINGS IN FORCE AS OF 031600Z OCT.
   ALL THE INFORCE WARNINGS ARE LISTED HERE.
   180/2025, 178/2025, 177/2025, 175/2025, 163/2025,
   162/2025, 153/2025, 148/2025, 145/2025, 144/2025,
   143/2025, 119/2025, 103/2025.
   283/2024.
   163/2023.
   198/2022.
2. THE COMPLETE TEXT OF ALL IN-FORCE HYDROARC
   BROADCAST WARNINGS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE NGA
   MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION WEBSITE AT:
   MSI.NGA.MIL/NAVWARNINGS.
   ALTERNATIVELY, THESE MAY BE REQUESTED BY E-MAIL
   FROM NGA AT NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL.
3. CANCEL HYDROARC 171/25.
